attributes.action: Scrap the UK contribution to the Eurovision song contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vast quantities of money are poured literally down the drain on the Eurovision song contest. As the recent contest proved it's now a political platform and Eastern European countries all group together.  Surely there's a better use for the licence payers fee than wasting it on this drivel. Could be spent on better programme content.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
